EmailTemplate.description: US-0010516 - Bug in user deactivation email notification process
EmailTemplate.name: User Deactivation Final Notification Email Template
EmailTemplate.subject: Final Notification before deactivation
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Target_User.Email}! Your access to Hive has been revoked due to not logging in. Hive users are automatically deactivated after 45 days with no login due to the high value of licences. If you wish to reactivate your Hive Profile, a colleague with access to Hive will have to raise a Reactivation Ticket on your behalf. To do this ask your colleague to click the link below and select "User Reactivation" from the menu:
RAISE HIVE TICKET
We are sorry to see you go! The Hive Team
